definition[0]: when someone or something arrives somewhere
example[0]: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
example[1]: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
example[2]: Shortly after our arrival in London, Lisa was attacked.
example[3]: A deposit is payable on arrival  (=when you arrive).
definition[1]: someone who has just arrived in a place
example[4]: New arrivals were greeted with suspicion.
example[5]: Late arrivals will not be admitted to the theatre.
